ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor and HDMI cable Included in this Full Set Complete Package.
4 x HDSDI cameras: GW50HDSDI - 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDI Video Output Level, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 72PCs IR LED, 164 feet IR Distance. Vandal proof & water proof
8 x analog cameras: GW71H - 1/3" HDIS CCD Camera, 650TV Line, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 30PCS Infrared LED, 65 feet IR distance, 0.1 Lux Min. illumination
HD-SDI High Definition 16 Channel DVR, 1080P, HD/WD1resolution, 4ch SDI + 12ch D1, Video 16in/1out, Audio 2in/1out, 4 alarm in/1 out, N9-1. iPhone, Android Viewing. HDMI & VGA. Utilize graphic user interface. Preview, recording, playback, and network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End HD-SDI 16 Channel Hybrid DVR with 4 x HD-SDI 2.1 Megapixel and 8 x analog 650TVL Vari-Focal Lens CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System , Free LED Monitor and HDMI cable, iPhone Android Viewable
